entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Flurries beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
